mapper.select: SELECT sp.ARTICLE_TITLE, sp.PRODUCT_PRICE, sp.PRODUCT_SEQ, img.IMG_NAME FROM SELL_PRODUCT sp, IMG_FILES img WHERE img.TABLE_PK = sp.PRODUCT_SEQ AND img.IMG_CATE_SEQ = 2 AND sp.ID = #{USER_ID}

SELECT dh.P_CHECK, dh.S_CHECK, sp.ARTICLE_TITLE, sp.PRODUCT_SEQ, sp.PRODUCT_PRICE, img.IMG_NAME FROM DEAL_HISTORY dh, SELL_PRODUCT sp, IMG_FILES img where dh.SELL_SEQ = sp.PRODUCT_SEQ AND sp.PRODUCT_SEQ = img.TABLE_PK AND img.IMG_CATE_SEQ = 2 AND BUYER_ID = #{USER_ID}

SELECT sp.ARTICLE_TITLE, sp.PRODUCT_PRICE, sp.PRODUCT_SEQ, img.IMG_NAME FROM JJIM j, SELL_PRODUCT sp, IMG_FILES img where j.PRODUCT_SEQ = sp.PRODUCT_SEQ AND sp.PRODUCT_SEQ = img.TABLE_PK AND img.IMG_CATE_SEQ = 2 AND j.ID = #{USER_ID}
